plot: When two friends discover a mysterious capsule that crash-landed in their town, they are hunted by renegades seeking the power within.
title: L.I.N.X.
plot_es: When two friends discover a mysterious capsule that crash-landed in their town, they are hunted by renegades seeking the power within.
plot_en: When two friends discover a mysterious capsule that crash-landed in their town, they are hunted by renegades seeking the power within.
